src: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.
mt: "Yanzu muna da 4-mako na yara masu kama da kwayoyin halitta wanda suka fi kowa da ciwon diabetis, ya kuma kara."
ref: “Yanzu muna bera mai watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari ba wadanda ke da suke fama da ciwon sukari,” in ji shi.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, shugaban ilimin lafiya a Dalhousie Jami'ar Halifax, Nova Scotia da shugaban shirin ilimi da kimiyya na ƙungiyar ciwon zuciya ta Kanada ya yi tsawaita cewa binciken bai kasance a yau ba.
ref: Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesan magani a Jami’ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen likitanci da bangaren kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sikari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa har yanzu binciken yana kan farkonsa.

src: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
mt: Kamar yadda yara daga cikin masana, shi ya keɓa game da cewa ciwon zuciya zai iya yin watsi, yana nuna cewa wannan bayanan ba ta da mahimmanci ga mutane da ke da ciwon zuciya na Type 1.
ref: Kamar wasu ƙwararrun, yana da shakkun cewa ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, inda ya bayyana cewa sakamakon bincike ba shi da alaƙa da mutanen da tuni su ke da nau’in ciwon sukari na 1.

src: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.
mt: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatare mai yiwuwa na kwamiti na adabi na Nobel a cikin Akademi ta Sweden, ta bayyana a matsayin wani shiri a shirin talabijin na Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamiti, ba daidai ba ya samun Bob Dylan a gabanin yin nasarar 2016 na Nobel a fannin adabi, ya fuskanci yin amfani da shi.
ref: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi.

src: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."
mt: Danius ya ce, "A yau ba a yi kowace aiki ba. Ina daidaita da kuma saita lamba ga abokinsa mafi kai da kuma an sami hanyoyin daidaitattun bayani. A yau, wannan ne kuma wani abu mai kyau."
ref: Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”

src: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.
mt: Yanzu, shugaban Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara ne lokacin da wani abin hawa ba ya yin jama'a daga cikin gidan shi a cikin garajinsa.
ref: A baya, Shugaban kamfanin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara lokacin da ba a jiyo sauti kararrawar jikin ƙofar sa daga shagonsa a cikin garejinsa.

src: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.
mt: Ya gudanar da wani kaijin WiFi, ya ce.
ref: Ya ce, ya gina ƙararrawar ƙofa ta WiFi.

src: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.
mt: Siminoff ya ce kasuwanci ya karfafa bayan yajin da ya yi a cikin 2013 a cikin wani lokaci na Shark Tank inda tawagar shirin ya kasa kudaden shiga a cikin gaggawa.
ref: Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun bunkasa bayan bayyanarsa a 2013 a cikin wani taron fim na Shark Tank inda taron kwamitin ya nuna ba da tallafin farawa.

src: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.
mt: A cikin 2017, Siminoff ya fito a kan QVC, wata hanyar watsa shirye-shirye ta kasuwanci.
ref: A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC.

src: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.
mt: Ring kuma ta kammala shari'ar da ta yi da kamfanin tsaro na gaba, kamfanin ADT.
ref: Ring ta kuma sasanta takardar kotu tsakanin wata kamfanin adawa na tsaro wato ADT Corporation.

src: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.
mt: Ba a san ba yanzu, ba wani abu ba ya nuna cewa abin da zai iya yin magani da cutar Ebola da ke yaduwa.
ref: Yayinda allurar gwaji rigakafi guda daya ta bayyana tana iya rage mutuwar cutar ta Ebola, har zuwa yanzu, babu wasu kwayoyi da aka nuna da suka dace da maganin cututtukan da suke kamuwa da su.

src: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.
mt: Daya daga cikin cikakken abinci, ZMapp, ya nuna kyau a cikin gida, amma binciken ayyuka ya nuna cewa ya fi yin aiki ba tare da yin aiki ba.
ref: Wani hadaddiyar giyar, ZMapp, da farko ya nuna alƙawari a fagen, amma nazarin yau da kullun ya nuna cewa ba shi da fa'ida fiye da yadda ake neman hana mutuwa.

src: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.
mt: A cikin PALM trial, ZMapp ya kasance a matsayin mai kula, wanda masana suka amfani da shi a matsayin basirin da suka kafa da yawa na yin bayyanawa da yawa.
ref: a nan gwajin PALM, ZMapp yayi bauta a wajen kula, hakan na nufin masana fasaha sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin kasan idan ka kimanta da hanyoyin guda uku nashi.

src: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.
mt: USA Gymnastics ya taimaka wa United States Olympic Committee's letter da ya yarda da yadda yake da wani muhimmiyar yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da yadda yake da
ref: Masu wasan tsalle tsalle na Amurka sun goyi bayan wasikar kwamitin gasar olympic tare da yarda da cikakkiyar bukatar duk masu wasan olympic da su yada maganar samar da yanayi mara hadari ga dukkan yan wasanmu.

src: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

mt: USA Gymnastics ta taimaka wajen binciken da ba ta da'awar da aka yi wanda zai iya zama mai zane a kan yadda yadda ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci gaba da ci

src: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
mt: USA Gymnastics da USOC suna da wannan matsayin - yin wasan kwallon rai, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a matsayin mafi kyawun wanda za'a iya yin wasa, da sauran, a mats
ref: Gidan motsa jiki na Amurka da USOC suna da manufa ɗaya - sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauransu, ya zama mai aminci yadda zai yiwu 'yan wasa su bi mafarkinsu cikin aminci, tabbatacce kuma mai ba da ƙarfi.

src: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
mt: A matsayin mai ba shawarar da shugaban Amurka John F. Kennedy ya yi aikin sa a 1960s, Brzezinski ya aiki a matsayin mai ba shawarar da shugaban Amurka Lyndon B. Johnson ya yi aikin sa.
ref: A duk tsawon 1960, Brzezinski yayi ma John F. Kenedy aiki a matsayin mai bada shawara kuma yayi aiki da gwamnatin Lyndon B. Johnson.

src: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
mt: A lokacin zartarwa na 1976 ya ba Carter shawarar siyasa ta waje, sannan ya yi aiki a matsayin Babban Sakatare na Tsaro (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya maye gurbinsa Henry Kissinger.
ref: A yayin zabukan 1976 ya shawarci Carter kan manufofin kasashen waje, sannan ya zama mai ba da shawara kan Tsaro na kasa (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya gaji Henry Kissinger.

src: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: A matsayin NSA, ya taimaka ga Carter a gudanar da al'amura na duniya, ciki har da Accords na Camp David, 1978; ci gaban al'ummar Amurka da Sin ta tsakiyar shekarun 1970; yancin Iran, wanda ya haifar da matsalolin Iran, 1979; da yakin soja na Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: kasancewarsa dan NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter a harkokin dokokin kasashen waje wajen kula da lamuran duniya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita alaƙar Amurka da China tana tunanin ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin garkuwar da Iran, 1979; da mamayar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.

src: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
mt: Wasannin, wanda ya haɗa da Ryan Gosling da Emma Stone, ya samu shigarwa a cikin kowane ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin ƙarƙashin
ref: Fin ɗin, da ke nuna Ryan Gosling da Emma Stone, ya sami shiga cikin duk manyan ɓangarorin gasar.

src: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.
mt: Gosling da Stone sun sami shawarwari don mafi kyawun jarumi da mace jarumi.
ref: Gosling da Stone sun sami shiga neman cikin kyautar Fitaccen Jarumi da Jaruma.

src: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.
mt: Ƙirarin sauran sunan sun hada da Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing da Original Screenplay.
ref: Sauran zaɓin sun hada da Hoto Mafi Kyau, Darakta, Majigi, Tsara Tufafi, Gyaran fina-finai, Makin Asali, Tsara Shiri, Gyara Sauti, Haɗa Sauti da kuma Asalin Labari.

src: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
mt: Biyu daga cikin waƙoƙi daga fim, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) da City of Stars, sun sami shawarwari don waƙa mafi kyau. Studio na Lionsgate ya sami 26 shawarwari - sama da kowace kungiya.
ref: Waƙoƙi biyu daga fim, Audition (Wawaye Waɗanda Suke Mafarki) da Birnin Taurari, sun karɓi zaɓi don mafi kyawun waƙar asali. Lionsgate studio ta sami nadin 26 - fiye da kowane sauran ɗakunan studio.

src: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.
mt: Yau, shugaban Amurka Donald Trump, a wata shaida da aka bayar a cikin sakon sakawa, ya bayyana cewa sojojin Amurka za su bar Siriya.
ref: A daren ranar Lahadi shugaban kasar Amurka Donald Trump a cikin wata sanarwa da aka fitar ta sanarwar sakataren, ya sanar da dakarun kasar Amurka zasu bar kasar Syria.

src: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: An sanar da wannan bayan Trump ya yi wani gajeriyar watsa hannu da Shugaban Turkiyya Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: An bayar da sanarwar ce bayan Trump ya yi ganawa ta wayar salula da Shugaban Turkiyya Recep Tayyip Erdogan.

src: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.
mt: Turkiyya za ta karɓi kula da masu tsaron ISIS wanda, an ce, kasashen Turai suna goyon bayan su.
ref: Haka kuma Turkiyya za ta karbi aikin gadin mayakan ISIS da aka kama waɗanda, sanarwar ta ce, kasashen Turai suka ki mayar da su.

src: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
mt: Wannan ba tare da yin watsi ba yana tantance cewa a cikin dinozaur kawai suna da ganye, wani abu da aka yi tunani a baya, amma yana ba da bayanan da ba a iya samun su a cikin gano, kamar launin ganye da tsayin ganye.
ref: Wannan ya tabbatar cewa ba wai kawai wasu dabbobin dinasour suna da gashi ba, wata fadar ma da ta yadu, amma ta yi cikakken bayanin da rubabbun halittu ba za su iya ba, kamar su launi da kuma tsarin kashi uku.

src: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.
mt: Masana sun ce tsabar tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar na tsabar
ref: Masana ilimin kimiya sun ce fiffiken dabbar launi kasa ne a sama mai dauke da kodaden launi da launin toka-toka ta karkashin ta.

src: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.
mt: Yin gano kuma yana ba da bayani game da ci gaban shuka a cikin tsuntsu.
ref: Binciken ya kuma ba da haske game da juyin halittar fukafiki a tsuntsaye.

src: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
mt: Ba daidai ba, masana suna da cewa kwayoyin dabbobi na dawwama ba su da kwayar rachis mai tsayin zafi, amma suna da kwayoyin dawwama da kwayoyin dawwama - barbules - masana suna da cewa kwayar rachis ta kasance a matsayin ci gaban tattalin arziki wanda kwayoyin dawwama na farko.
ref: Domin gashin fuka-fukin dinosaur bashi da isasshen tsari, wanda ake kira kara, amma suna da sauran sifofin gashin fuka-fukan — tsandar gashi da kananan — masu binciken sun kammala cewa wata kila karan wani cigaba ne na juyin halittan wadannan sauran sifofin.

src: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
mt: Shugaba Kirchner ta bayyana cewa ta yi shawarar yin shawarar shiga shugabanci a Theater na Argentina, wani lokaci da ta amfani da shi don fara yin kamalun shugabanci a 2005 don majalisar Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.

src: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.
mt: Yayin da yake yin wani biki, akwai kusan miliyan 4 masu zuwa Roma don yin wani biki.
ref: Fiye da mutane miliyan huɗu suka je Rome don halartar jana’izar.

src: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
mt: Adadin masu zuwa ya kasance cikin yawa don haka ba za a iya samun damar yin ziyarar jana'izar a cikin gida a cikin gida.
ref: mutanen da suka halarta sun yi yawa yadda ba zai yiwu kowa ya iya samun shiga wajen jana’izar ba da ke dandalin Peter.

src: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.
mt: An gudanar da taron daidai a wani lokaci da aka gudanar a wasu wurare a Roma don samun damar yin tunani.
ref: An kafa manya garkuwan talabijin da dama wurare da dama a Rome domin mutane su samu daman kallon bikin.

src: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.
mt: A cikin manyan biranen Italiya da cikin duniya, musamman a Poland, an kafa manyan shirye-shiryen da aka nuna ga yawan jama'a.
ref: A sauran biranen kasar Italiya da kuma sauran kasashen duniya musamman a Poland, an kafa makamancin ginuwar wanda ya samu dubiyar jama’a da dama.

src: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.
mt: Shugaban Amurka George W. Bush ya kai Singapore a ranar 16 ga watan Nuwamba, ya fara wani matsayi na kwanaki 7 na Asiya.
ref: Shugaban kasar America George W. Bush ya iso Singapore a safiya 16 ga Nuwanba, domin fara yawon bude ido na tsawon mako daya a Asiya.

ref: Mataimakin Firayi Ministan Singapore Wong Kan Sang ne ya tarbe shi, sannan su ka tattauna al’amuran kasuwanci da ta’addanci tare da Firayi Ministan Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.

src: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.
mt: Bayan matsala a zaben tsakanin karni, Bush ya bayyana a cikin jama'a game da ci gaban kasuwanci a Asiya.
ref: Bayan mako guda da shan kaye a zabukan tsakiyar wa’adi, Bush ya fada wa wasu magoya baya fadadar kasuwanci a Asiya.

src: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
mt: Shugaban kasa Stephen Harper ya yarda da yin wani taron kungiyar kasa da kasa don ajiye 'Clean Air Act' zuwa kwamiti don ajiye shi bayan yajin da aka yi a ranar Litinin na mintuna 25 a cikin gida yayin da ya tafi wani taron da shugaban kungiyar NDP Jack Layton a cikin PMO.
ref: Firayi Minista Stephen Harper, ya amince da aika kudurin ‘Dokar “Tsarkakakkiyar Iska’ zuwa ga kwamitin gamayyar jam’iyyu don sake dubawa, kafin ayi mata karatu na biyu, bayan taron mintuna 25 na ranar Talata tare da shugaban jam’iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO.

src: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.
mt: Layton ya bukata canje-canje ga tsarin tsakanin masu tsaron gida a taron da ya yi da PM, yana bukata don "gudanar da bincike da kuma yin daidaitaccen bugawa" tsarin tsakanin masu tsaron gida na jam'iyyar tsakanin masu tsaron gida.
ref: Layton ya nemi canje-canje ga dokar ra’ayin mazan jiya yanayi lokacin haduwa da Firayim Ministan, yana tambaya don “cikakken sake rubutawar” dokan Jam'iyyar ra’ayin mazan jiya.

src: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.
mt: Bayan hukumar tarayya ta shiga cikin kudaden Mersey Hospital a Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da kuma 'yan majalisar tarayya da yawa sun goji wannan aiki a matsayin wani shago a cikin gudanar da zartarwa na kasa mai zuwa a watan Nuwamba.
ref: Tun daga lokacin da Gwamnatin Tarayya ta shiga daukar nauyin asibitin Mersey da ke Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu ‘yan majalisar tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin ci gaban shirin zaben tarayya da za a kira a watan Nuwamba.

src: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.
mt: Amma Shugaban gwamnatin John Howard ya ce aikin ya kasance don kare fasahar hanyoyin yin aiki daga kashewa ta gwamnatin Tasmanian, a bayar da kudin AUD$45 miliyan.
ref: Amma Firayim Minista John Howard ya ce dokar an yi ta ne domin kare ginin asibitin domin kada gwamnatin Tasmania ta rage masa kima, wajen kara kudaden da dala miliyan 45 ta Australiya.

src: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

ref: “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.”
